projects.title: Enterprise IAM Automation Platform
projects.description: PowerShell and Python-driven user provisioning system for 500-user organization across 450+ applications with compliance reporting for financial services regulations.
features: 30% reduction in manual provisioning processes
Automated compliance reporting pipeline for financial services
Integration with Jira ticketing and Monday.com project management
Complex stored procedures for access logging and reporting

projects.title: SMELS - Small Model Error Log Summarizer
projects.description: Intelligent CLI tool that analyzes and provides actionable fixes for errors across multiple programming languages using local AI models for privacy-focused development workflow enhancement.
features: Multi-language error detection (Rust, JS, Python, Java)
Local AI processing with privacy-first design
Web interface with caching for improved performance
Published as open-source crate on crates.io

projects.title: Enterprise Billing System Features
projects.description: ASP.NET enterprise billing platform with KnockoutJS frontend, optimized for high-volume financial transaction processing with enhanced user experience.
features: Invoice design system improvements and UI enhancements
Database query optimizations for high-volume billing operations
Enhanced user experience across billing workflows
Agile development with consistent code quality delivery

projects.title: RustAIx - Systems Programming Exploration
projects.description: Advanced systems programming project exploring Rust's capabilities in AI-adjacent domains, demonstrating modern memory-safe systems development practices and performance optimization.
features: Exploration of Rust's memory safety in complex systems
Performance-critical implementation patterns
Modern systems architecture design
AI-adjacent systems programming concepts

projects.title: QA Automation Framework
projects.description: Comprehensive test automation suite using Selenium WebDriver and BDD methodology with Gherkin scenarios for enterprise billing system validation.
features: 40% reduction in issue resolution time
Automated regression testing pipeline for billing systems
BDD scenario coverage for critical payment processing flows
Custom testing templates and linting scripts for development teams

projects.title: Crux AI Framework
projects.description: Personal project: Intelligent AI system combining large language models with custom Rust architectures for flexible reasoning and problem-solving across different domains.
features: Conceptual mapping and multi-step reasoning capabilities
Vector search and retrieval for information discovery
Modular AI components for various problem types
Integration with workflow orchestration systems
